DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect palonosetron correct QT interval duration general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Palonosetron QTc Interval During Perioperative Period
DOC.criteria: Elective abdominal surgery general anesthesia Cardiac valvular disease Clinically significant arrhythmia include atrial fibrillation Antiemetics within 24 hour surgery Steroids within 1 week surgery Cancer chemotherapy radiotherapy within 4 week surgery Diabetes mellitus Pregnancy Patients receive QTprolonging drug
